title: Cella DEVELOPMENT API
description:
⚠️ ATTENTION: PRERELEASE!  
                  This API is organized into modules based on logical domains (e.g. `auth`, `organizations`, `memberships`).
                  Each module includes a set of endpoints that expose functionality related to a specific resource or cross resource logic.

                  The documentation is generated from source code using `zod` schemas, converted into OpenAPI via `zod-openapi` and served through the `hono` framework.

extensions.description: Authorization middleware applied to the endpoint

publicGuard.name: public
publicGuard.description: No authentication required; provides baseDb without RLS context

authGuard.name: auth
authGuard.description: Requires valid session and sets auth context (user, memberships, baseDb)

crossTenantGuard.name: crossTenant
crossTenantGuard.description: Requires authGuard and sets user-scoped RLS db context for cross-tenant access

orgGuard.name: org
orgGuard.description: Validates organization membership within tenant context

relatableGuard.name: relatable
relatableGuard.description: Checks that the requesting user shares at least one organization with the target user

tenantGuard.name: tenant
tenantGuard.description: Requires authGuard, validates tenant access, and sets tenant-scoped RLS db context

extensions.description: Rate limiting rules applied to the endpoint

spamLimiter.name: spam
spamLimiter.description: Max 10 requests/hour per IP for email-sending endpoints

emailEnumLimiter.name: emailEnum
emailEnumLimiter.description: Blocks IP for 30 min after 5 consecutive failures

passwordLimiter.name: password
passwordLimiter.description: Blocks email/IP for 30 min after 10 consecutive failures

presignedUrlLimiter.name: presignedUrl
presignedUrlLimiter.description: Max 2000 requests/hour per user for presigned URLs

totpVerificationLimiter.name: totpVerification
totpVerificationLimiter.description: Blocks for 30 min after 5 failed TOTP attempts

pointsLimiter.name: points
pointsLimiter.description: Consumes 1 API point(s) per request against per-tenant hourly budget

tokenLimiter.name: token
tokenLimiter.description: Blocks IP for 30 min after 10 consecutive token failures

extensions.description: Caching strategy applied to the endpoint

appCache.name: app
appCache.description: TTL cache with session-signed token validation

publicCache.name: public
publicCache.description: LRU cache for public page entities
